title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\V1\Query
name: Query
description:
A query for entities.

Generated from protobuf message google.datastore.v1.Query

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.projection
params.description: The projection to return. Defaults to returning all properties.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: The kinds to query (if empty, returns entities of all kinds). Currently at most 1 kind may be specified.

params.name: data.order
params.description: The order to apply to the query results (if empty, order is unspecified).

params.name: data.distinct_on
params.description: The properties to make distinct. The query results will contain the first result for each distinct combination of values for the given properties (if empty, all results are returned).

params.name: data.start_cursor
params.description: A starting point for the query results. Query cursors are returned in query result batches and can only be used to continue the same query.

params.name: data.end_cursor
params.description: An ending point for the query results. Query cursors are returned in query result batches and can only be used to limit the same query.

params.name: data.offset
params.description: The number of results to skip. Applies before limit, but after all other constraints. Optional. Must be >= 0 if specified.

params.name: data.limit
params.description: The maximum number of results to return. Applies after all other constraints. Optional. Unspecified is interpreted as no limit. Must be >= 0 if specified.
